title: Town Crier
name: Bartholomew
summary: The Town Crier, a figure worth pitying, stumbles through the streets with his announcements. His theatrical flair is overshadowed by his obvious vices, making him a somewhat unreliable but entertaining source of news.
history: Once a hopeful actor, the Town Crier's dreams of stardom were crushed by a string of disastrous performances. The town crier position was his last resort, a role he clings to desperately. Though often eclipsed by his personal struggles, his theatrical background occasionally shines through.
notes: Voice cracks occasionally, especially when excited or inebriated
Gestures wildly while making announcements, often losing balance
Spends most of his wages at the gambling hall, tavern, and brothel
Can be easily bribed to include personal messages in official announcements
